body.name: 5K Video Camera Camcorder 48MP UHD WiFi IR Night Vision Vlogging Camera for YouTube 16X Digital Zoom 3” Touch Screen Camera Recorder with Microphone,Handheld Stabilizer,Lens Hood,Remote,2 Batteries

features: 【2024 Latest 5K Video Camera】5K 30FPS 48MP Video Camera can capture video footage with a resolution of 5K (around 5120 x 2880 pixels) at 30 FPS, and 48.0 MP image resolution. 5K camera can capture video with a resolution higher than 4K. 3.0 inch touch screen with 270 degree rotation, 16X digital zoom.This resolution is suitable for professional video production, particularly for projects intended for larger screens or high-quality editing.

【5K Wifi Camcorder & IR Night Vision】 5K Wifi camcorder enable remote view, image capture and video shooting. Downloading "iSmart DV2" APP, easy to connect the camcorder with Android/iOS smartphones and tablets. Then you can browse images, transfer, share movies and photos via your mobile devices, or remote control the camera by App. Just press ''OK'' button, this Youtube video camera with infrare LED light allows you to shoot clear white/black photos or videos in the dark.

【Webcam Function & HDMI Output & External Microphone】The 5K vlogging camera supports for video chatting and live streaming when used as webcam.just connect this 5k Video camera with computer through USB cable and choose “PC Camera” to enter webcam mode, and choose “General UVC Camera” on external camera of social media software.5K camcorder with microphone can eliminate background noise/wind noise effectively.You can also connect the 5K camera to the TV with an HDMI cable.

【Lens Hook & Handheld Stabilizer & Remote Control】 This 5K digital video camera comes with lens hook to block excess light and protect your camcorder lens from accidental damage. Foldable handheld Stabilizer holder Keep the 5K camera stable when recording. This 5K Youtube camera comes with 2.4G wireless remote, which can control this digital video camera within 60 feets from any direction.

【Multifunctional 5K Camcorder & After-Sale Service】 This 5K digital camera support 4k/5k mode switch,pause function(click “photo”), face detection, continuous shooting, anti-shake, self-timer, time-lapse shooting, slow motion, recording while charging, will meet your different needs. HDMI output, Webcam, MSDC, USB 2.0 and up to 256GB SD card, support tripod and LED light (tripod and LED light not included). 1 year warranty and 24 hours online customer service will be supported.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Warm Tips: 1. Please carefully read the user manual before using video camera. 2. The camcorder is designed for the amateurs, not for the professionals.(Autofocus & optical zoom are not supported). 3. The camcorder doesn't support manual focus, the lens is fixed. Please keep a shooting distance above 1.5m/4ft to take a clear picture or video. 4. Please format the memory card through this camera for the first time use (Support 4-256GB SD card, NOT Included,a Class 10 or higher memory card is required).

UHD 5K/30FPS & 48MP &16X Digital Zoom Video Resolution：5K 30FPS; 4K 30FPS; 2.7K 30FPS; 1080P 60FPS; 1080P 30FPS; 720P 60FPS; 720P 30FPS Image pixel : 48M,36M,24M,20M,16M,12M,8M,5M. This 5K Camcorder support 4x, 8x, 16x digital zoom WIFI Control Function 5K Wifi camcorder enable remote view, image capture and video shooting.Downloading "iSmart DV2" APP, easy to connect the camcorder with Android/iOS smartphones and tablets. You can share your beautiful photos and videos on Facebook, YouTube, and other social media. Infrared Night Vision With this video camera for youtube equipped with infrared night vision function, you can press the "OK" button to turn on the night vision function, and you can take clear black and white photos or videos even at night. You can enjoy the fun of shooting at night. (Exposure adjustment range -2-+2 EV)

Anti-shaking function The 5K camcorder has upgraded its anti-shake function, The advanced anti shake system can effectively reduce the shaking of handheld photography, making your image more stable. External Stereo Microphone & Remote Control The External Microphone that adopts stereo can reduce noise and provide clearer and smoother sound. The remote control can control the video camera from a far distance. Webcam Function & HDMI Output The 5K video camera for YouTube can be used as webcam to provide excellent quality video streaming on social media,also perfect for daily video calling.This camcorder supports TV output and can be connected to TV to share your video with family and friends.

270 Degree Rotation & 3" IPS Touch Screen The 5k camera comes with a 3.0" IPS 270-degree rotating touch screen. Easily shoot images and videos at any angle. The sensitive touch screen brings you an excellent sense of experience. Foldable Handheld Stabilizer This 5k vlogging camera has a foldable handheld stabilizer to easily take low-angle photos and videos. The handheld stabilizer is ergonomically designed, lightweight and durable. Camcorder with Hood This 5K digital video camera comes with lens hook to block excess light and protect your camcorder lens from accidental damage.

Specifications Video Resolution： 5K 30FPS; 4K 30FPS; 2.7K 30FPS; 1080P 60FPS; 1080P 30FPS; 720P 60FPS; 720P 30FPS Image pixel : 48M,36M,24M,20M,16M,12M,8M,5M Memory card： 4-256GB SD card，Support SDXC C10 U1 grade and above (not included) File Format : JPG, MP4 USB interface : Type C USB2.0 Screen size : 3-inch IPS touch display Camera Lens&Tripod interface : Ff (F/2.2 f=3.37mm); Standard 1/4 inch screw opening Operating system： Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11, Mac 10.2 Automatic Shutdown : 1 minutes/3 minutes/5 minutes / off white balance： Automatic, daylight, cloudy day, incandescent lamp, fluorescent lamp (H), fluorescent lamp (L) ISO Sensitivity : Automatic/100/200/400/800/1600/3200 Battery Life : Video ≤ 90 minutes, photography ≤ 150 minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for Content Creators
reviews.reviewText: I am beyond impressed with this 5K Video Camera Camcorder! As a passionate YouTuber, I've been on the lookout for a camera that can take my vlogging game to the next level, and this camera is a game-changer in every sense.The 48MP UHD quality is breathtaking. It captures the most intricate details with stunning clarity, and the colors are incredibly vibrant. The 16X digital zoom allows me to get up close and personal with subjects without compromising the quality of my videos. It's a game-changer for my channel.The IR Night Vision is a feature I never knew I needed until I tried it. Whether I'm shooting in low light or complete darkness, the camera delivers impressive footage, and the built-in microphone ensures I capture clear audio even in challenging conditions. Plus, the inclusion of the external microphone is a fantastic bonus.The 3" touch screen is intuitive and easy to navigate, making adjustments a breeze. The handheld stabilizer is a dream for shooting on the go; it eliminates shakes and keeps my videos smooth and professional. The lens hood is a thoughtful addition to avoid unwanted glare or flares in my shots.In conclusion, this camcorder offers outstanding value for its price. It's a complete package for YouTubers, vloggers, and anyone interested in high-quality video recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for making instructional videos or anything you want to record. Easy to use out box
reviews.reviewText: Capture life's precious moments with this top-of-the-line Video Camera. Designed with your convenience in mind, this camera features an adjustable screen for easy viewing and framing. Say goodbye to running out of power at the wrong moment this camera comes with not just one, but two long-lasting batteries. For stable shots and professional-grade audio, utilize the ergonomic handle and high-quality microphone.With its impressive zoom feature, you can bring distant subjects closer without compromising on clarity or quality. Don't worry about complicated setups or confusing instructions this video camera is incredibly user-friendly, allowing you to start recording right out of the box.Whether you're documenting family gatherings, capturing breathtaking landscapes, or creating content for your vlog, this Video Camera has got you covered. Experience the joy of effortless filming and relive your memories in stunning detail would buy again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I so wanted to like this camera. I have bought it to videotape my child's performance and I am so glad that I took it with me to test it at the rehearsal. I was sitting on the first row. It does not pick up colors. All costumes were whitish/blurry. Zoom was jerky and I couldn't find golden medium for me to cover the whole stage. It would either have too much on the sides or too close, so some of the performers were cut out. Quality of the video in general was very poor, pixelated, wrong colors. I don't even know where to start with the sound. I had mic connected. Sound was scratchy and poor clarity. Just to compare I used my phone to videotape actual performance from the exact same seat. Video was vastly different. Colors were bright and clear, sound had clarity, richness, and balance. So this camera is going back. I have no idea what other reviewers have bought, but I don't think it was this camera or they have never recorded anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this camera with the intention of using it for creating content. Out of the box, the camera and external microphone is charged. The touchscreen interface will take a bit to get used to, however the owners manual is very helpful. It comes with the external microphone and screen is able to turn around so you can record yourself easily. The quality of the video is great and records in 4K. In low light situations you need to purchase an external light/flash. I personally use a ring light.Upon reviewing the manual, I noticed you are able to use as a webcam as well. I WFH 3 days a week and have many calls with clients and when I used this camera instead of the work laptop it is such a great and impressive upgrade to quality.Overall quality for the price is great! I will recommend this to those who wanted to make content and those who need an upgrade for their current webcam if working from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Unbeatable All-in-One Camera Package.
reviews.reviewText: This recorder is a true gem, with incredible 5K quality that captures every detail with stunning clarity. It’s also very lightweight and compact so I cannot wait to travel with it to get some footage and create memories. It comes with so many extras included like a versatile mounting equipment and a convenient travel bag and stabilizer, everything you need to capture high-quality content comes with it. I ended up saving money by buying this because if I had to buy all the extras separately, it wouldn’t been more. Night vision and 16x digital zoom take your recordings to a whole new level. The sound quality is also impeccable, This camera is a must-have for all videography enthusiasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The 5K video camera was easy to assemble and begin. Unfortunately, I didn't really read instructions correctly before I started. READ DIRECTIONS!! I took quite a few pictures, most were very grainy. I was able to salvage some on the computer. Also, be sure to get the correct SD card, my read too slow. I will be trying more pictures and videos real soon. As you can see in pictures, I'm going to be a great-grandmother!
